name: Phosphor Icons
description:
🐣 New in 1.3.1


  • Icon refinements and ✨ 122 new icons ✨
  • Showcase added, featuring Phosphor icons in example UI
  • Revised Read Me
  • Full changelog at https://github.com/phosphor-icons/phosphor-home/releases/tag/v1.3.1


🐣 New in 1.2.1


  • Icon refinements and ✨ 89 new icons ✨
  • Read Me page added with icon grid
  • Performance enhancements to the React library and our site phosphoricons.com


————————————————


Phosphor is a flexible icon family for interfaces, diagrams, presentations — whatever, really.


  • 894 icons and counting
  • 6 weights: Thin, Light, Regular, Bold, Fill, and Duotone
  • 5,364 total icons
  • Designed at 16 x 16px to read well small and scale up big
  • Raw stroke information retained to fine-tune the style
  • Icon grid included to create your own additions


More ways to use at phosphoricons.com.


Contact us at hello@phosphoricons.com.
